name: Mothman (flatleyr)
description:
2D Shooter, I want to disclose here that for some reason my UI game canvas was not allowing me to click the buttons to go to the next level or main menu, I re-watched the tutorials and tried everything I could to get it to work. I should have reached out and asked about fixing it but that's hard for me right now, I'll try to get better. Hopefully you can look at my modifications even though that is an issue. My apologies.

My modifications:

1. Retextured and animated player and enemies.

2. Made more intricate level design and added soundtracks to them.

3. Re textured environment and animated details.

Made By Rachel Flatley
